'''Albert''' is [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]]'s cousin. He is a botanist. He is mentioned to be having a bachelor party in "[[The One With All The Jealousy]]". Chandler mentions that he has no friends and claims to believe he is only getting married so he can have an excuse to see a stripper.

If Albert is a cousin from Chandler's father's side, his last name is probably Bing, otherwise it is different.
